extendedInfo.description: A spell checker application to easily spell check text as well as put in some simple html features and then send it off to your favorite application. Allows other developers to easily integrate this editor into their applications with intents.This also includes many editing features such as font style, color, size and ability to open and save files.NOTES:*Permission required for ads*Not all applications will accept html textFAQ:*Why is this not integrated into other apps? I can't integrate into other apps, but I allow developers to integrate it if they want. If you want this as part of another app, let the developer know. *I don't want ads?! A pro version is available to buy on the Android Market.kw:mail,email, speller, wysiwyg, editor, spell check, spell checker, spelling, spell

reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
reviews.comment: I am a writer and hate editing. I tend to miss spell words when its late and I\'m writing or my tablet autocorrects my words thinking I mean something else. So when I found this app on my tablet I used it every time I finished a chapter to my story. Now I\'m using it on my phone and I still love it. I wish I could get the pro versiin because I hate the ads but I can\'t. Its still amazing though. Get it if you aren\'t a great speller or just want your document to be double checked. Glad I installed it.
reviews.author: belle ryan

reviews.title: From first look I like it
reviews.comment: Only have done 1 test, and that was voice to text. Did the old \"Testing testing 1234\", did not get the result what I expected, instead I was given the option to select from testing testing 1234 or 1 2 3 4 or one two three four, now that is good, 5 five stars just for that alone. Update, have just installed Easyprint, entered my gmail account and did a cloud test print, worked as advertised. Thankyou
reviews.author: Murray Greenfield

reviews.title: Thank you Developer
reviews.comment: The new Update was very much needed. Thank you for use of the free app. Been using it about a yr. Now has one to purchase, will do that. Now working great. I like to type here, and check spelling. Get fat fingered sometimes, and misspell some easy word then post it, ops to late, FOR ALL TO SEE. At least workout your verbage here, presto...copy-paste. It\'s a no brainer, you gotta try this. If it FCs after installing, restart phone. Happened to me. 2.3.5 Android, ZTE. GOOD BYE SPRINT. lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Thank you..... due to my hearing problem I have always had issues with spelling but thanks to this app I\'ve now successful got a 2:1 in my degree thank you..... ill be using this throughout my time...... when there is a paid version I will be buying it anyday to get rid of ads. Once again thank you :)
reviews.author: Danny Holmes

reviews.comment: The voice option is amazing. You have to speak clearly and the room has to be silent, but hey......
reviews.author: kathy piliouras

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: A great spell checker it even got a 28 letter word fist time with no problem I have replaced my old spell checker for this app and its on all my devices

reviews.comment: Works just perfect, have no side effects, good integration with maildroid. Thanks.

reviews.title: don\'t bother
reviews.comment: I might have paid for the full version but after installing this app and getting the message \"can\'t spell check. daily limit has been reached\" on the very first use, I\'ll go with some other app.
reviews.author: Gretchen Workman

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I have a samsung infuse 4g, and have used this ap for a while.  I\'m an awful speller and use this app quite frequently.  It works very quickly and easily.  I definitely recommend it for anyone needing help with spelling, I love it, five stars!

reviews.comment: It\'s simple. it works smooth,  if carry on the way it is,  we will go along  to gather,  for long time!!!!
